Header: US Embassy Officials Offer Help in CIMIC Training
Content: Two Colombo-based US embassy officials with the objective of providing knowledge on management of civil affairs to Army troops in different courses, held preliminary discussions to the same effect at the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) on Wednesday (31). Director Information at the US Embassy of Sri Lanka, Mr Armando A Peralta and Deputy Director (Civil-Military Coordination) Mr Jonathan M Cotton had discussions in this regard with the Colonel General Staff P.K.S Nandana and a group of senior Army Officers.
